name: Flying Bird VR
description:
A VR game made by 7 people in 6 days. It's our first try to make a game and a VR game.

Hope you enjoy the game.

The game requires SteamVR and VR headset to play.

[Trigger] to enter the game and start the game

[Touchpad] or [WASD] to move 

Avoid rocks and other things in your way. Do not crash. And fly out of the cave!
